gampaha makewita banku sewikawak ghathanaya kirima sambandha naduwe chudithaya wu yapa appuhamilage binara sanjaya karunarathna namaththa eeye (30) gampaha mahadhikaranayedi aniyam minimarime chodanawata thama waradakaru bawa siya nithignyawaraya margayen mahadhikarana winisuru piyasili wikramasinha mathurata mahathmiya idiriye prakasha keleya.rajaye adhinithignya niyomi wikramasekara mahathmiya karunu idiripath karamin 297 chodanawa yatathe chudithata chodana idiripath kara athi bawath, hadisi kopaya matha mema maranaya siduwi athi athara minimarumak nowana aniyam minimarumak bawata warthawi athi bawath pawasuwaya.withthiye nithignya athula pranandu mahatha chuditha meya sitha matha kala mini marumak nowana bawath siddhiya gana pashchaththapa wana bawath warada piliganna bawath pawasiya.withthiye nithignyawarayage saha rajaye adhinithignyawariyageda karunuwalata sawandun gampaha mahadhikarana winisuru piyasili wikramasinha mathurata mahathmiya danduwam niyama kirima mayi masa 23 wani dinata kalthabuwaya.paminilla wenuwen rajaye adhinithignya nayomi wikramasekara mahathmiya samanga gampaha polisiya penisiti athara withthikaru wenuwen nithignya athula pranandu mahatha peni sitiyeya.siddhiyen ghathanaya wuye makewita padinchi roshani surangika wikramaaarachchi (25) namathi awiwahaka banku sewikawaki..

nawasilanthaya dewarak ragbi loka kusalanaya dina athi athara-1987 di ostreliyawe saha nawasilanthaye pawathi palamu loka kusalanaya, awasan warata 2011 di nawasilanthaye pawathi loka kusalanaya, ema dewathawedima awasan tharangayedi owun hamuwe parajayata path wuye pranshayayi.1991 loka kusalanayedi owun awasan purwa tharangayedi ostreliyawa hamuwe parajaya wuwada thewana sthanaya sandaha wu tharangaya jayagathha.1995 loka kusalanayedi,awasan tharangayata krida kala nawasilanthaya athireka kalayedi labagath lakunu hethuwen sathkaraka dakunu aprikawa hamuwe parajayata pathwiya.1997 loka kusalanayedi,awasan purwa tharangaya saha thewana sthanaya wenuwen krida karana tharangaya yana dekama parajaya wima nisa owunta himi wune siwwana sthanayayi.2003 wasaredi nawatha awasan purwa tharangayedi sathkaraka ostreliyawa hamuwe parajaya wi pasuwa thewana sthanaya himikaraganna ladi.2007 loka kusalanaya,ragbi loka kusalana ithihasaye nawasilanthayata amihihirima loka kusalanaya bawata path karamin sathkaraka pranshaya hamuwe ardha awasan purwa tharangayedi parajaya wimata owunta siduwiya;[40] meya siduwana thek siyaluma loka kusalana wala awasan purwa tharanga walata sudusukam labu ekama rata nawasilanthayayi.[41]
